title: Meta

class.description: The CSS class to use for the section instead of the default `hlx-section` one

tagname.description: The element tag name to use for the section instead of the default `div` one (i.e. `section`, `main`, `aside`)

meta.description: When set to `true`, will output the additional meta properties as data attributes (i.e. `'foo = bar'` will become `data-hlx-foo='bar'`)

types.description: When set to `true`, will output the section types as additional CSS classes (i.e. `class='hlx-section has-image has-heading'`)

intro.description: Extracted first paragraph of the document

image.description: Path (can be relative) to the first image in the document
